mapper.sql: user_id , user_password, user_name, user_email, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_join_date, user_withdrawal_date, user_withdrawal_status, user_role
mapper.insert: insert into User (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_nickname, user_phone_number) values (#{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_email, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_join_date from User where user_email = #{userEmail}

select cc.challenge_category_name, c.challenge_title, c.challenge_description, u.user_nickname, (challenge_delete_date - challenge_create_date) challenge_remain_date from Challenge c inner join Challenge_Category cc on c.challenge_category_code = cc.challenge_category_code inner join User u on c.challenge_author_id = u.user_id inner join Challenge_Participant cp on c.challenge_id = cp.challenge_id where u.user_id = cp.user_id
